attributes.action: We believe that MP's are currently over paid.
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that MP's are currently over paid and that MP's pay should be pegged to the national average wage and that they cannot have any other job and that they may not take up a directorial position at any company for 5 years after they leave the house.
This would encourage MP's to actually work for the country rather their own interest and make them realise how difficult it is for someone to live in this country even on average wages.
